caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. JAMES LeGRONE,

opinion.posture: Appeal from COA: 218666, Michigan, Wayne CC: 91-11107.
opinion.opinion_text: On order of the Court, the delayed application for leave to appeal from the March 1, 2000, decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant has failed to meet the burden of establishing entitlement to relief under MCR 6.508(D).
